chav1961.purelib.streams.interfaces

Interface CharacterSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ArrayCharSource, ReaderCharSource, StringCharSource

    public interface CharacterSource

    This interface describes char source to use in the different parsers.

    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    chav1961
    See Also:
    chav1961.purelib.streams.charsource

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static char EOF
      The End-Of-Stream constant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int atColumn()
      Get actual column of the content
      int atRow()
      Get actual row of the content
      char last()
      Get last char read
      char next()
      Get next char from input stream
      int totalReaded()
      Get count of the total data read

    • Field Detail

      • EOF

        static final char EOF

        The End-Of-Stream constant

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • next

        char next()
   throws ContentException

        Get next char from input stream

        Returns:
        next char from input stream or EOF if input stream was exhausted
        Throws:
        ContentException - any content exceptions

      • last

        char last()

        Get last char read

        Returns:
        last char read or EOF if no next() call before yet

      • totalReaded

        int totalReaded()

        Get count of the total data read

        Returns:
        count of the total data read

      • atRow

        int atRow()

        Get actual row of the content

        Returns:
        1-based actual row of the content. If can't define, 0 will be returned

      • atColumn

        int atColumn()

        Get actual column of the content

        Returns:
        1-based actual column of the content. If can't define, 0 will be returned
